content:
<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00004" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="javax.activation-api" groupId="javax.activation"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="javax.activation groupId has been replaced by jakarta.activation">
                        <message>Replace dependency groupId `javax.activation` with `jakarta.activation`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                        <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-activation-g" type="REPLACE">
                               <replacement>jakarta</replacement>
                               <search>javax</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
